title: Go, Diego Go! Hopping Ball
description: Little bouncers can go, go, go, just like Diego, on this giant hopping ball. It features durable vinyl construction, an easy-grip handle, a recessed inflation valve to prevent snags, and bright, colorful designs. Helps build balance and coordination. Ball circumference of inflated ball is 50.25"; height with handle is 18.5". Air pump not included.
